text: Pelvic girdle amyotrophy - Pelvic girdle muscle atrophy - Pelvic girdle muscle weakness - Proximal muscle weakness - Rimmed vacuoles - Scapular winging - Shoulder girdle muscle atrophy - Shoulder girdle muscle weakness - Temporal cortical atrophy - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
